h2_title: Cyan Loong Boss Fight and Guide
content: If he begins to hold his sword back while pointing at you, the air will crackle around him preventing you from getting close, and his two-handed sword swing will also unleash an electric projectile slash you'll need to evade.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Cyan_Loong.md', within the main section titled 'Cyan Loong', specifically from the subsection 'Cyan Loong Boss Fight and Guide'.
The content is as follows:
If he begins to hold his sword back while pointing at you, the air will crackle around him preventing you from getting close, and his two-handed sword swing will also unleash an electric projectile slash you'll need to evade.
